definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: Suarez and Andy Carroll could be a real handful together next season.
sentences.chinese: 小苏和安迪下赛季的搭档一定会很牛逼的。

sentences.english: Frankfurterin:Do you think that Eintracht will be promoted this season?
sentences.chinese: 你认为法兰克福这个赛季会晋级吗？

sentences.english: The first season took place in nineteen ninety-six.
sentences.chinese: 第一个赛季参加了96年的地方。

sentences.english: Finally a word on Burnley, did last night prove they will be no pushovers this season?
sentences.chinese: 最后说说伯恩利，昨晚证明他们本赛季能够保级吗？

sentences.english: Arsenal goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny is determined to hold on to his Arsenal place next season.
sentences.chinese: 什琴斯尼下定决心要在下赛季保住他的首发地位。

sentences.english: The Rockets were a popular choice to make the Western Conference finals when the season began.
sentences.chinese: 赛季初的时候，火箭是众望所归的西部决赛球队。

sentences.english: This also marked the first season played in the newly built Staples Center.
sentences.chinese: 这同时也是新建成的斯台普斯中心的第一个赛季。

sentences.english: I'm not going to overenjoy it just because it might be my last.
sentences.chinese: 我不会因为这是最后一个赛季就怡然自得。

sentences.english: I wanted to put him on awareness so that he could possiblcdfds. com prepare going into next season.
sentences.chinese: 我想让他意识到点，以便为下一赛季做。

sentences.english: Megeve ski station started its season early thanks to the recent snowfalls.
sentences.chinese: 最近的降雪已拉开了梅杰夫滑雪站的赛季。

sentences.english: Ray just broke Reggie's NBA 3-point record this season.
sentences.chinese: 雷阿伦在该赛季刚刚打破了雷吉米勒的三分球记录。

sentences.english: Last season was a humiliating homecoming.
sentences.chinese: 上赛季荣归故里是演砸了。

sentences.english: "I'm very happy. It's also the best start of my season, " the Brazilian said.
sentences.chinese: “我非常高兴，这是我最好的赛季开始，”巴西人说。

sentences.english: Over the past few seasons, they've been linked to nearly every big star and transfer story around.
sentences.chinese: 过去几个赛季里大牌球员进进出出。

sentences.english: For me, it's our biggest game of the season.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，那是本赛季最重要的比赛。

sentences.english: Chelsea's win gives them a goal tally of 103 for the season - a Premier League record.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西单个赛季共进103个球，成为了英超新记录。

definition: to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
on stage/to go on stage/to take the field
